days.text: Dry. Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 4 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Very dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 northerly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Dry. Fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Fine. Force 2 to 3 north to northeasterly winds.
